name: GitHub Issues
description: This app integrates with the GitHub API v3 to support issue-based actions

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Get a list of issues for the GitHub repository

limit.description: Maximum number of issues to be fetched

actions.description: List comments for an issue on the GitHub repository

limit.description: Maximum number of comments to be fetched

example_values: I am writing a comment to this issue

actions.description: Retrieve an issue for the GitHub repository

example_values: This is the body I believe of the issue

actions.description: Create an issue for the GitHub repository
actions.verbose:
Only users with push access can set assignees/labels for the issues. 
Assignees/labels are silently dropped otherwise.

assignees.description: Comma-separated list of logins (usernames) for the users to assign to this issue

labels.description: Comma-separated list of labels to associate with this issue

example_values: This is what the body looks like when testing from the app

actions.description: Update an issue for the GitHub repository
actions.verbose:
Only users with push access can set assignees/labels for the new issues. 
Assignees/labels are silently dropped otherwise.

assignees.description: Comma-separated list of logins (usernames) for the users to assign to this issue

labels.description: Comma-separated list of labels to associate with this issue

actions.description: Create a comment for an issue on the GitHub repository

comment_body.description: Contents of a comment to add to the issue

example_values: I am adding a comment from the app
I am adding a comment from the app

actions.description: Add label(s) to an issue on the GitHub repository
actions.verbose:
Only users with push access can set labels for the issues. 
Labels are silently dropped otherwise.

labels.description: Comma-separated list of labels to add to the issue
